website_summaries.verdict: Simple, effective, and vividly colored, these inexpensive hot neon birthday candles will get the job done while looking totally rad.
pros: Features bright neon yellow, pink, orange, and green colors
cons: Some colors glow brighter under UV light than others

customer_reviews.title: Light the wicks to get the most out of the candles
customer_reviews.text: Not much different than other celebratory candles for cakes and cupcakes, these are smooth, bright and help make happy days happier while providing minimal heat and light from their burning wicks if you ignite them. Otherwise, they are colored wax surrounding a fiber thread.
customer_reviews.author: +or-

customer_reviews.title: I totally recommend them
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for a glow in the dark party and they really fulfilled my expectations
customer_reviews.author: Arly

customer_reviews.title: They are regular sized birthday candles in four colors
customer_reviews.text: As birthday candles go, they are no better and no worse than others this size, however I was not able to find them locally, so I just ordered them on-line. The good thing about these candles is that they come in a 24-pack. My previous candles which I ran out of came in a 12-pack for about the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Fan

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: Got these for a 2 yr old birthday party. The neon colors are great!! All the kids wanted turns blowing out the candles. Since they dont burn down too fast, we had fun re- lighting and getting great pics. Great quality and color.
customer_reviews.author: NonnieTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this last May for my husband birthday but i keep it and use it for my daughter 9th birthday. Add some colors to my cupcakes so beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Genebe

customer_reviews.title: Worked good for daughters glow party.
customer_reviews.text: One of the colors doesnt glow in black light but oh well. Came with 24 and I only needed 13.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These are not anything like those other thin, fragile, hard to light and burn down too fast candles. Colors are very brilliant and candles can be used more than once. A really good deal!
customer_reviews.author: christine parkinson

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: We used these for a glow birthday, they were perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Callie

customer_reviews.title: Not all of the neon colors glow in blacklight.
customer_reviews.text: These neon candles are exactly what is pictured, though they will not work for our blacklight Birthday Party as not all of the neon colors glow in the UV light.
customer_reviews.author: Candace Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Glad I tried these
customer_reviews.text: I used the candles for a “Glow Crazy” cake. They really looked amazing with a blacklight!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Best Black Light Glow Neon Candles!!
customer_reviews.text: Great color that glows really bright under a black light. Try them-They're much better the others that advertise glow in the dark or uv reactive.
customer_reviews.author: SandyBeach

customer_reviews.title: Burn baby burn!
customer_reviews.text: They’re perfect if you want something to light on a cake to wish someone a happy birthday. They’re birthday candles. So, they do that well. Happy birthday!
customer_reviews.author: KCxo

customer_reviews.title: Festive!
customer_reviews.text: Fun colors. Made the cake so festive! Slow burning and were still so big I’m going to use them again! The kids loved them!
customer_reviews.author: Carol M.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful colors
customer_reviews.text: Bright neon in color and exactly what I was looking for !
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Donovan

customer_reviews.title: Just what you're looking for if you need to throw some candles on a cake
customer_reviews.text: Regular birthday candle. Burns consistently with no burning out and we didn't experience too much dripping. They're smooth surfaced so easy to clean and use again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Yennerell

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise excellent for the price
customer_reviews.text: Came on time and product was just as I expected. Only thing is that this candles are tiny!!! so just have that in mind. Otherwise excellent for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sent the Wrong Candles!
customer_reviews.text: Sent wrong product with few candles - made a mess of $200 in cakes!
customer_reviews.author: Jolita

customer_reviews.title: Great birthday candles to keep on hand
customer_reviews.text: It seems like in the past I always forgot to buy the candles and had to go back to the store. Now I have these great little birthday candles I keep on hand. They are brightly colored in an assortment of hues. And with 24 to a pack they are a good value.
customer_reviews.author: teawithlemon

customer_reviews.title: All colors glow but one
customer_reviews.text: All colors glowed beautifully except for one. Not sure which one since it was a black light party. Would recommend this item but just be prepared for a full set of one color not to glow.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Yellow isn't UV reactant
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for a glow party but the yellow does not glow. It is okay though because I didn't need all of them!
customer_reviews.author: Rafael vidal

customer_reviews.title: Love the neon colors!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased these candles before because of their bright neon colors. They are also taller than regular birthday candles. Wilton slwsys has good products and the price was quite reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Karen K

customer_reviews.title: Bright neon colors
customer_reviews.text: Looks cute on neon cake for party. Does not glow under black light but knew that when I bought them. They were still great candles.
customer_reviews.author: Shiggy

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay lit
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a birthday party and they would not stay lit!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Vee

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: great price for the product I still have some left over from he birthday party and planing on using it for my oldest next B day.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew & Sarah

customer_reviews.title: as expected, pictured.
customer_reviews.text: as expected, pictured. Little pricey but helped in a pinch to match our theme
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a Black light party!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a black light party and they did glow under a black light. I was happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Sadie Parker

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: A good value, a little thin but not too thin to break when inserted into a cookie cake.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Love the bright colors!
customer_reviews.text: Bright colors, do what they are supposed to and very reasonably priced!
customer_reviews.author: Kasie Mays

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These candles are very good! and love the bright colors!
customer_reviews.author: Mace 85

customer_reviews.title: Great birthday candles - not dripping & great colors!  Fast ship; very good.
customer_reviews.text: Great colors - used all the yellow & orange this time - perfect!
customer_reviews.author: GoodNeighbor

product_meta.title: Wilton Birthday Candles, 2.5-Inch, Hot Colors, 24-Pack
product_meta.description: Item Package Quantity:1Birthday Candles 2.5" 24/Pkg-Hot Colors WILTON-Celebration Candles: Hot Colors. Add fun to any occasion with Wilton's novelty candles. This package contains twenty-four 2-1/2 inch candles in neon colors (6 each of 4 colors). Imported.
feature_bullets: The 60682's 15 Inch in length, coupled with continuous airflow, insures that tough, heavy materials are no match
The Package Width of the Product is 12.0 inches
Perfect for decorating cakes, cookies, cupcakes and more
Package Dimension: 8.68 L x 0.23 W x 3.74 H"

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars232 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
